song.title: Tonight You Belong To Me
song.lyrics:
I know (I know) you belong To somebody new But tonight You belong to me
Although (although) we're apart You are a part of my heart But tonight You belong to me
Wait down by the stream How sweet it will seem Once more just to dream in The moonlight My honey I know With the dawn That you will be gone But tonight You belong to me
But tonight You belong To me
